name: obsidian-settings-enforcer
description: Obsidian plugin to enforce selected core app.json settings at startup

scripts.version: node version-bump.mjs && git add manifest.json versions.json
scripts.release:patch: npm version patch --no-git-tag-version && npm run create-tag-and-push
scripts.release:minor: npm version minor --no-git-tag-version && npm run create-tag-and-push
scripts.release:major: npm version major --no-git-tag-version && npm run create-tag-and-push
scripts.create-tag-and-push: npm run version && git commit -am "Release $(node -p "require('./package.json').version")" && git tag $(node -p "require('./package.json').version") && git push origin main --tags

author: Chris Caskey
